channel.title: Playstation on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Playstation on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: Is the era of dedicated gaming devices coming to an end?
item.description: Today was the day when PlayStation Vita launched worldwide. I had the chance to play most of the launch games already during GDC Europe last August and I think that both hardware and launch lineup are impressive. But I didn’t buy PS Vita on launch. It’s probably a very sad day for Sony, bacause “PlayStation” is my religion (on Facebook, at least :) ). What happended? I faced the truth - mainstream mobile gaming is already on Android and iOS, and a lot of titles are released every day.
